meanings: a struggle, a strenuous effort, hard fighting, 분투하다 fight[battle] (against) , struggle (hard), exert oneself, make a strenuous effort

vlive.korean: 눈물겨운 분투가 숨어있다는 진실을 설득력 있게 보여준다. there is a hidden struggle that prevents the inside from becoming a monster. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 허영생 편
vlive.english: there is a hidden struggle that prevents the inside from becoming a monster.

examples.korean: Newspaper editors all strive to be first with a story. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 신문 편집자들은 모두 어떤 기사를 맨 처음 싣기 위해 분투한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He’s still fighting for compensation after the accident. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 사고 후 아직도 보상을 받기 위해 분투하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
